channel.title: BUpolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUpolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: White House tells agencies to draft mass firing plans ahead of potential shutdown
item.description: The White House is telling agencies to prepare large-scale firings of federal workers if the government shuts down next week.

item.title: Justice Department trying to indict former FBI Director Comey by next week
item.description: Federal prosecutors are trying to indict former FBI Director James B. Comey before the statute of limitations runs out next week for perjury charges.

item.title: Thune 'very concerned' about Trump advising pregnant women not to take Tylenol
item.description: Senate Majority Leader John Thune made a rare break from President Trump on Wednesday and cautioned against pregnant women following the president's a...

item.title: Judge rules Trump broke law by firing inspectors general, but can't restore them to office
item.description: A federal judge said Wednesday that President Trump broke the law when he fired many of the government's inspectors general, but she said she's powerl...

item.title: Judge rules feds can't require states to cooperate on immigration to get disaster money
item.description: A federal judge in Rhode Island ruled on Wednesday that it's unconstitutional to require states to cooperate on immigration enforcement actions to get...

item.title: They Never Learn: Chicagoland Sanctuary Politicians Continue to Sabotage the Rule of Law
item.description: As ICE steps up enforcement in Chicago and its suburbs, sanctuary politicians are once again attempting to sabotage the rule of law and protect illega...

item.title: New poll reveals warning signs for Trump with Latino voters
item.description: A survey from the liberal-leaning group Somos Votantes shows Latino voters are souring on the president.

item.title: Trump is selling a strong economy. Voters aren’t buying it.
item.description: Privately, aides concede voters remain uneasy about prices but argue their policies are beginning to turn things around.

item.title: Wu Woos Illegal Aliens in Boston
item.description: For Boston Mayor Michelle Wu, protecting illegal aliens takes priority over defending her city against a federal lawsuit, compromising much-needed fed...

item.title: Over 3 Million People Sign Leniency Petition for Illegal Alien Charged with Killing Three Florida Motorists
item.description: Over 3 million people have signed a petition demanding leniency for Harjinder Singh, the illegal alien truck driver accused of causing a horrific cras...

item.title: The Trump Administration Plans to Crack Down on Immigration by Islamist Extremists
item.description: The Trump administration is considering a ban on members and affiliates of the Muslim Brotherhood and similar organizations and networks. This makes c...

item.title: Third Military Buffer Zone Established Along U.S.-Mexico Border in Arizona
item.description: The “Yuma National Defense Area” at the southern border in Arizona allows the military to support the Trump administration’s whole-of-government appro...

item.title: Former Trump statistics chief slams Friday firing of Erika McEntarfer
item.description: Bill Beach said the president's suggestions that the jobs report was rigged betrayed a misunderstanding in how those numbers are assembled.

item.title: Trump fires statistics chief after soft jobs report
item.description: The monthly jobs report showed just 73,000 jobs in July, with big reductions to May's and June's numbers

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
